title: Student-Led Objective Tutorial (SLOT) Simulation Training for Strengthening Fundamental Pharmacology Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and medication administration experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based VR simulation utilization, structured around real-life pharmacology application cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more nervous system drug mechanism of actions using the SLOT method.
Learners can solve medication administration scenarios via VR simulation with 80% accuracy.
Learners enhance self-directed drug information-seeking skills through peer feedback-based learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
